import React, { Component } from 'react' import { List, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react" class lotery extends Component { state = { num1: null, num2: null, Addition: null, different: null, } componentDidMount() { this.props.Type === 1 ? this.setState({ different: "* Is valid for "+ this.props.Expiration +" month" }) : this.props.Type === 2 ? this.setState({ different: null }) : this.setState({ different: "* Is valid until "+this.props.ExpireDate }) this.props.LoteryType === "Discount" ? this.setState({ num1: this.props.Sum, num2: this.props.SumType + " Discount" }) : this.props.LoteryType === "Plus Free" ? this.setState({ num1: this.props.Num1 + " + ", num2: this.props.Num2 + " Sale" }) : this.setState({ num1: this.props.Num1 + " in ", num2: this.props.Num2 + " $" }) this.setState({ Addition: this.props.Addition }) } render() { console.log(this.props) return {/* {this.props.Type ===2 ?
Congradulations
:""} */} {this.props.Type === 1 ? "New Member" : this.props.Type === 2 ? "Birthday" : "Club Members"}
You have {this.state.num1}{this.state.num2}
{this.state.Addition+" "+this.state.different}
 } } export default lotery;
